# restful-webservices-app
**Description:** This is a RESTful web application project that implements API calls such as user sign-up/login, email verification sent from AWS SNS, password reset, update, delete with  Spring security roles and authorities. The project was built using Spring MVC and Spring Boot with MySQL as database (currently H2 is enabled), and it has been deployed to a Amazon AWS Cloud EC2 server.<br />

**Link** to the documentation generated by Swagger: http://ec2-35-88-121-223.us-west-2.compute.amazonaws.com:8080/mobile-app-ws/swagger-ui.html
